message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for $9500. It's a fantastic opportunity to get a high-end item at a competitive price. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share such a valuable product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8000 for the product.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more than $8000 to make this deal worthwhile for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer the product to you for $10000. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand the value you place on this product. I am willing to pay $9000 for it.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time I can offer the product to you for $10500. I think it's a fair price considering the value it holds for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice, but I believe we can find a mutually beneficial solution. I am willing to pay $9500 for the product.
